mapper.select: SELECT m.`month`, IFNULL(tb.budget_number,0) AS money FROM tb_finance_total_budget tb RIGHT JOIN tb_month m ON m.`month` = tb.budget_month AND tb.record_status = 1 AND tb.cost_type_id = #{costTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tb.department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE m. MONTH BETWEEN #{startMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY m.`month`

SELECT tb.cost_type_id as costTypeId, max(tb.cost_type_name) as costTypeName, tb.department_id as departmentId, max(tb.department_name) as departmentName, #{startMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as startMonth, #{endMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as endMonth FROM `tb_finance_total_budget` tb LEFT JOIN tb_finance_type t ON t.id = tb.cost_type_id WHERE tb.record_status = 1 AND t.record_status = 1 AND tb.budget_month BETWEEN #{startMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY tb.cost_type_id, tb.department_id ORDER BY t.show_order
